events.message: I just received my order today, but the laptop screen is cracked and there are several scratches on the casing.
The reported problem involves a damaged product with cracks and scratches, categorized under Product Defect.
Your case has been assigned to an agent specializing in product defects for further assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damaged laptop screen and scratches. I’m here to help get this resolved for you.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and scratches? This will help us process your claim faster.
I’ve attached several clear photos showing the cracked screen and the scratches on the laptop casing as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would like a replacement unit since I still want to keep the laptop. Thank you for the quick response.
Your replacement laptop order has been processed and will ship within 2 business days. The defective unit can be returned using the prepaid label.
Just checking in to confirm you received your replacement laptop and are satisfied with the solution provided.
